body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Larry Scott and the customer's name is Barbara Henderson.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Larry Scott, and I represent MetaCar, your trusted car rental agency. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's a pleasure to meet you, Barbara! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit frustrated with my recent reservation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that might be upsetting. Could you please provide me with your reservation number? It typically has five digits.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! I appreciate that. Could you also confirm the email address associated with your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Let me look into your reservation and see what's causing the issue.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Larry. I really appreciate your help with this.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Barbara. Thank you for your patience. I will resolve this for you shortly. Thank you for your time today!
